global.name: g_errorMessages
global.value: {1: 'There is an internal bug in 4Suite. Please make .../listinfo/4suite. The error code to report is: %s', 2: 'Syntax error in XPointer expression: %s', 3: 'Invalid resource, or not well-formed XML: %s', 4: 'Expression does not locate a resource'}
